sources.title: Another 202112
sources.description: Another  ( Japanese :  アナザー ,  Hepburn :  Anazā )  is a 2012 Japanese school  mystery   horror film  directed by  Takeshi Furusawa , starring  Kento Yamazaki ,  Ai Hashimoto ,  Yoshihiko Hakamada  and  Ai Kato  and based on the novel  of the same name  by  Yukito Ayatsuji . [2]  It was released in Japan by  Toho  on 4 August 2012. [3]
